text: Mad Money is a 2008 criminal-comedy thriller movie. Diane Keaton plays Bridget. Katie Holmes plays Jackie. Queen Latifah plays Nina. The movie received mixed to negative reviews from the critics. It was released on January 18, 2008. title: Mad Money
